Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Dock-hi and grade level loading doors
±20’ minimum Clear Height | Fully fire sprinklered

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Steptoe Industrial Complex is located near the intersection of Tropicana Avenue & Boulder Highway close to the US-95. It provides easy access to Green Valley, Henderson and the I-215 and US-95 freeways.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Steptoe Industrial Complex is an ±80,330 SF Industrial Investment on ±4.2 Acres of land, consisting of three (3) individual buildings on two (2) parcels; Five (5) tenants; All Leases Triple-Net (NNN). For more information please contact Dean Willmore at 702-369-4808.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: ±80,330 SF Owner/User Industrial Complex on ±4.2 Acres

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
UP AND COMING BUSINESS LOCATION
*Exceptional freeway proximity: direct access to I-93/515 freeways.
*Immediate access to Tropicana Avenue and Boulder Highway, near the Eastside Cannery Casino & Hotel and Sam Town Hotel & Casino.
*Significant surrounding investment projects:
-Google has started construction on a $600 million, 64-acre data facility with plans to hire approximately 200 employees in 2020. It will be 1 of 6 located in the United States and approximately 5 miles from the Steptoe location.
-Boulder Highway Corridor: an express service between Henderson and the Fremont Street Experience in Downtown Las Vegas. The City will promote the revitalization and transformation of the Boulder Highway Corridor.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
*Davidsohn Industrial Park is comprised of 5 freestanding buildings situated on a corner parcel totaling 11.54 acres. It offers significant frontage and signage along East Tropicana Avenue, a corridor with the average daily traffic exceeding 20,000 cars.
* The 87% leased, multi-tenant property includes a diverse mixture of occupants representing a wide range of industries with balanced annual lease rollover.
*The weighted average in-place rent provides an attractive inflation-protected income stream, as demonstrated by a ±40% increase between the first and tenth year of the holding period.
*Remaining vacancies provide new ownership with an upside proposition to extract accretive returns, through the lease-up of remaining vacant suites at attractive market rents.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Phase 1 Report: Complete and Available to Buyer
Geotechnical Report: Complete and Available to Buyer

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 2805 N. Rancho Drive is located on the NW corner of Rancho Drive and Decatur Blvd; across the street from the North Las Vegas Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 2805 Rancho is a ±1.47 Acre vacant commercial Land site, located across the street from the North Las Vegas Airport on the NWC of Rancho Drive and Decatur Blvd, and just south of Cheyenne Avenue; C-2 zoning for general commercial uses. All off-site improvements are completed, and a Phase 1 and Soils Reports are complete and available.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Direct Frontage on Valley View Boulevard
Three (3) Tenants | All Leases are NNN

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the high demand southwest industrial submarket with close proximity to I-15 and I-215 freeways, the Las Vegas Strip, and McCarran International Airport. LOCATED IN AN OPPORTUNITY ZONE!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 5845, 5865, 5885 Valley View Boulevard is a 100% LEASED ±23,272 SF Industrial Compound on ±3.59 Acres. It is located in the high demand southwest industrial submarket with close proximity to I-15 and I-215 freeways, the Las Vegas Strip, and McCarran International Airport, and is also located in an "Opportunity Zone". Three (3) Tenants; All Leases are Triple-Net (NNN). Asking Price is $7,650,000.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 100% LEASED ±23,272 SF Industrial Investment on ±3.59 Acres

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The office/industrial project is located off Ponderosa Way just West of S. Valley View Boulevard. Interstate 15 (I-15) is accessible via S. Valley View Bouelvard to W. Russell Road. The 215 is within ±2.1 miles via S. Decatur Bouelvard.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 5461 Arville Street is located in the highly desirable Southwest submarket, on Arville Street between Hacienda Avenue & Russell Road, less than 10 minutes from the Las Vegas Strip.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 5461 S. Arville Street is a  ±9,558 SF Freestanding Two-Story Concrete Tilt on ±0.53 acres. It features ±4,000 SF of Two-Story HVAC office/showroom area, ±5,558 SF of Evaporative cooled warehouse area, one (1) 10' x 10' Dock Hi Loading Door, two (2) 12' x 14' grade level doors, ±20’ Clear in the warehouse, Forklift access to second level, fluorescent lighting and skylights, and private fenced yard.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: ±9,558 SF Dock-Hi Industrial Building w/ Fenced Yard
